00023 using System;
00024 using System.IO;
00025 using System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary;
00026 using System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap;
00027 using System.Text;
00028 using System.Xml.Serialization;
00029 #endregion
00030 
00031 namespace Utilities.IO
00032 {
00036     public static class Serialization
00037     {
00038         #region Public Static Functions
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042

00044         public static void ObjectToBinary(object Object, out byte[] Output)
00045         {
00046             try
00047             {
00048                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00049                 {
00050                     BinaryFormatter Formatter = new BinaryFormatter();
00051                     Formatter.Serialize(Stream, Object);
00052                     Stream.Seek(0, 0);
00053                     Output = Stream.ToArray();
00054                 }
00055             }
00056             catch { throw; }
00057         }
00058 
00065         public static void BinaryToObject<T>(byte[] Binary,out T Object)
00066         {
00067             try
00068             {
00069                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00070                 {
00071                     Stream.Write(Binary, 0, Binary.Length);
00072                     Stream.Seek(0, 0);
00073                     BinaryFormatter Formatter = new BinaryFormatter();
00074                     Object = (T)Formatter.Deserialize(Stream);
00075                 }
00076             }
00077             catch { throw; }
00078         }
00079 
00086         public static string ObjectToXML(object Object, string FileName)
00087         {
00088             try
00089             {
00090                 string XML = ObjectToXML(Object);
00091                 FileManager.SaveFile(XML, FileName);
00092                 return XML;
00093             }
00094             catch { throw; }
00095         }
00096 
00102         public static string ObjectToXML(object Object)
00103         {
00104             if (Object == null)
00105             {
00106                 throw new ArgumentException("Object can not be null");
00107             }
00108             try
00109             {
00110                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00111                 {
00112                     XmlSerializer Serializer = new XmlSerializer(Object.GetType());
00113                     Serializer.Serialize(Stream, Object);
00114                     Stream.Flush();
00115                     return UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(Stream.GetBuffer(), 0, (int)Stream.Position);
00116                 }
00117             }
00118             catch { throw; }
00119         }
00120 
00126         public static void XMLToObject<T>(string FileName, out T Object)
00127         {
00128             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(FileName))
00129             {
00130                 throw new ArgumentException("File name can not be null/empty");
00131             }
00132             if (!FileManager.FileExists(FileName))
00133             {
00134                 throw new ArgumentException("File does not exist");
00135             }
00136             try
00137             {
00138                 string FileContent = FileManager.GetFileContents(FileName);
00139                 Object = XMLToObject<T>(FileContent);
00140             }
00141             catch { throw; }
00142         }
00143 
00150         public static T XMLToObject<T>(string XML)
00151         {
00152             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(XML))
00153             {
00154                 throw new ArgumentException("XML can not be null/empty");
00155             }
00156             try
00157             {
00158                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(XML)))
00159                 {
00160                     XmlSerializer Serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));
00161                     return (T)Serializer.Deserialize(Stream);
00162                 }
00163             }
00164             catch { throw; }
00165         }
00166 
00173         public static void XMLToObject(string FileName, out object Object,Type ObjectType)
00174         {
00175             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(FileName))
00176             {
00177                 throw new ArgumentException("File name can not be null/empty");
00178             }
00179             if (!FileManager.FileExists(FileName))
00180             {
00181                 throw new ArgumentException("File does not exist");
00182             }
00183             try
00184             {
00185                 string FileContent = FileManager.GetFileContents(FileName);
00186                 Object = XMLToObject(FileContent,ObjectType);
00187             }
00188             catch { throw; }
00189         }
00190 
00197         public static object XMLToObject(string XML,Type ObjectType)
00198         {
00199             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(XML))
00200             {
00201                 throw new ArgumentException("XML can not be null/empty");
00202             }
00203             try
00204             {
00205                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(XML)))
00206                 {
00207                     XmlSerializer Serializer = new XmlSerializer(ObjectType);
00208                     return Serializer.Deserialize(Stream);
00209                 }
00210             }
00211             catch { throw; }
00212         }
00213 
00220         public static T SOAPToObject<T>(string SOAP)
00221         {
00222             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(SOAP))
00223             {
00224                 throw new ArgumentException("SOAP can not be null/empty");
00225             }
00226             try
00227             {
00228                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(SOAP)))
00229                 {
00230                     SoapFormatter Formatter = new SoapFormatter();
00231                     return (T)Formatter.Deserialize(Stream);
00232                 }
00233             }
00234             catch { throw; }
00235         }
00236 
00242         public static string ObjectToSOAP(object Object)
00243         {
00244             if (Object == null)
00245             {
00246                 throw new ArgumentException("Object can not be null");
00247             }
00248             try
00249             {
00250                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00251                 {
00252                     SoapFormatter Serializer = new SoapFormatter();
00253                     Serializer.Serialize(Stream, Object);
00254                     Stream.Flush();
00255                     return UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(Stream.GetBuffer(), 0, (int)Stream.Position);
00256                 }
00257             }
00258             catch { throw; }
00259         }
